title: Create Gurukul Aulmni Assocation alumni association app (MVP)

requirements.text: Create a responsive public landing page for "Gurukul Aulmni Assocation" that introduces the association and provides clear calls to action to sign in and explore the app.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays the association name exactly as "Gurukul Aulmni Assocation".
Page is responsive on mobile and desktop.
Primary actions include: Sign in (Internet Identity) and Browse (read-only previews or prompt to sign in).

requirements.text: Add Internet Identity sign-in and sign-out UI, and show the signed-in userâ€™s principal (or a short form) in the app header/navigation.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in and sign out using Internet Identity.
When signed in, the UI indicates authenticated state (e.g., principal displayed).
Unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in when attempting member-only actions.

requirements.text: Implement alumni profile management: allow a signed-in user to create/update their own alumni profile with fields: full name, graduation year, department/major, current city/country, bio, and optional contact (email or social link).

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: A signed-in user can create a profile and later edit it.
Profiles are persisted in the backend canister and reload correctly after refresh.
A user can only edit their own profile.
Validation prevents empty full name and invalid graduation year (non-numeric or unreasonable range).

requirements.text: Implement a searchable alumni directory page that lists member profiles (name, graduation year, department/major, location) with filters for graduation year and department/major.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: Directory loads profiles from the backend and renders a list/grid.
Search by name works (case-insensitive).
Filters (year, department/major) narrow the results.
Clicking a directory entry opens a profile detail view.
Sensitive fields marked optional contact are not shown unless present.

requirements.text: Add Events feature: a page to view upcoming/past events (title, date/time, location, description) and an admin-only interface to create/update/delete events.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: Any user can view the list of events sorted by date.
Admin users can create, edit, and delete events from the UI.
Non-admin users cannot access event management actions (UI hidden/disabled and backend enforced).
Event changes persist and are visible to all users after refresh.

requirements.text: Add Announcements feature: a page to view announcements (title, date, content) and an admin-only interface to create/delete announcements.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: Any user can view announcements sorted newest-first.
Admin users can create and delete announcements.
Non-admin users cannot create/delete announcements (UI + backend enforced).
Announcements persist and render correctly after refresh.

requirements.text: Implement backend authorization and administration: create a simple admin list managed in-canister, with a secure method for initial admin assignment and admin management actions restricted to admins only.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: Backend enforces that only admins can mutate events/announcements and manage admin list.
There is a defined mechanism to set the first admin (e.g., canister install-time default, or first authenticated caller) and it is documented in code comments.
Unauthorized calls return clear errors (or Result-style errors) and do not change state.

requirements.text: Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app and apply it consistently across pages (typography, color palette, spacing, and components). Avoid a blue/purple primary theme.

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: App has a consistent theme across header, pages, forms, and lists.
Primary colors are not blue/purple.
Key pages (Landing, Directory, Events, Announcements, My Profile) share consistent layout and navigation.

requirements.text: Generate and include required static images for branding, store them in frontend/public/assets/generated, and reference them in the UI (e.g., header/landing).

quotes: make me a app for alumni association. alumni name: Gurukul Aulmni Assocation

acceptanceCriteria: All required images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Landing/header renders the generated logo and hero/banner image from static assets (not served via backend).
Images display crisply at common screen sizes without distortion.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui; compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrapping paths listed by the system (compose around them).
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Payments, donations, or membership fee collection.
Email/SMS notifications or integrations with external email providers.
Third-party auth providers other than Internet Identity.

required: Alumni association logo mark with academic motif (gurukul-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero/banner illustration with alumni/community/education theme (gurukul-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
